item.title: A year as tech lead
item.description: End of the year has always been a good time for each of us to do a retrospective on how we did for the past year, and this year, I am doing a review on one of the significant changes of my life: being promoted to tech lead. The following is a brief summary of what I have learned and what I am looking forward to in the next year.
